facebook.title: Past, present, future: how human evolution and climate are linked
facebook.summary:
Over the past year, carbon dioxide (CO₂) levels in the atmosphere have risen faster than any period in the past 55 million years. That’s the finding of my study published in Global Change Biology.

facebook.title: Past, present, future: how human evolution and climate are linked
facebook.summary: While climate change has gained scientific attention in the past 50 years, and political action in the last 25, humans have been altering the atmosphere much longer than that.

news.title: Пусть льет
news.summary: В 2015 году уровень двуокиси углерода в атмосфере рос быстрее, чем в любой период из последних 55 миллионов лет.
